page.title: 07THE POSTMASTER
page.content: The Post Office is owned by MR.and MRS. LOXHAM. This a new venture for them.MRS. LOXHAM used to be a teacher, and MR. LOXHAM used to be in International Technical Recruitment They obviously enjoy working together; when they embarked on this new venture, they were told it would put great strain on them as a married couple and should not be entered into lightly! They have a very friendly and helpful manner and are obviously in the process of successfully building up the business. The majority of the P.O. business consists of dealing with pensions and benefits, and handling the incoming and outgoing mail.They do not employ anyone, and live behind the shop. The room above the shop being used as a store room.
